PerformanceGetEntries.summary: The getEntries() method returns an array of all objects currently present in the performance timeline.

remarks.para: If you are only interested in performance entries of certain types or that have certain names, see and .

blockquote.para:
This method does not notify you about new performance entries; you will only get entries that are present in the performance timeline at the time you call this method.
To receive notifications about entries as they become available, use a .

remarks.para: The following entry types are not supported by this method at all and won't be returned even if entries for these types might exist:
To access entries of these types, you must use a instead.

PerformanceGetEntries.returns: An {{jsxref("Array")}} of objects. The items will be in chronological order based on the entries' .
